Baahubali: The Eternal War â€“ Part 1 is an upcoming Indian 3D animated epic film set in the established universe of the Baahubali: The Beginning (2015) and Baahubali: The Conclusion (2017) franchise. Announced in late 2025, it is the first of a two-part animation series intended to expand that mythic world.
